text: geudaedeul-i sonsil-eul ib-eoss-eul ttae, geudaedeul-eun imi (jeogdeul-ege) geugeos-ui gobjeol(ui sonsil)eul ibhyeoss-eum-edo, “eotteohge ileon il-i?” lago malhandan mal-inga? geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : ‘geugeos-eun geudaedeul jasin-egeseo on geos-ila.’ sillo hananimkkeseoneun modeun geos-i ganeunghan bun-isila
